participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and talkative, enjoys sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: I once pretended to be my girlfriend, Luis, in order to get out of a speeding ticket. As a child, I won a national spelling bee. My favorite truck is a Chevy Duramax. I'm a busy mom who is always on the go, but I always make time for my morning coffee. I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Reflective and a bit anxious, values companionship but feels overwhelmed by responsibilities.
participant_2.background: I had to learn how to balance my time between my two jobs while also taking care of my family. I do not like my reputation. I am still single at the age of 35. I like to watch ma. I don't own a car, but my cats are my world.

content.text: Hey what's up
Not much just getting ready for a movie night with my cats
That sounds fun! I'm just hanging out with my kids
How many kids do you have?
I have two, a boy and a girl
I want kids someday but I'm not sure if I'm ready for that yet
I know it's a lot of work but it's so rewarding
Yeah that's what everyone tells me
It's hard to explain but when you have kids you just know it's what you're supposed to do
I think I'm starting to get it
Do you have any pets?
No I don't have time to take care of a pet
I understand, they can be a lot of work
Yeah but they're so cute
I know right
Are you excited for the movie you're watching?
Yeah I've heard good things about it
Me too! I'm looking forward to it
Me too
Have fun at your movie night!
Thanks you too
